long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Had enough about X's advanced search? We are bringing modern user experience to X search.

The current X advanced search is:
- Unfriendly user interface
- Can’t adjust the current search
- Limited search history

Install Better Twitter/X Search, you'll get:
- Friendly user interface
- Easy to adjust current search
- Search query is always cached
- Save as many as important searches
